data: Heterogeneous Graph Learning from earnings calls data
Dual-mechanism approach integrating local relationships and stock dynamics
Modeling dynamic relationships through information entropy
Multi-relational propagation process with parallel retention
Consistent excellent performance across all markets including NASDAQ, NYSE, Shanghai (2016-2023)
Two-stage denoising framework with Locality-aware attention
Iterative purification labeling to reduce Noise
Precision: 59.1% Improvement in win-loss ratio in volatile markets
Optimized trainable sentiment aggregation for prediction
Self-reflective LLM framework for autonomous learning
Excellent performance in both prediction and explanation quality
